description: Updates the service settings for Linux subscriptions.

parameters.name: LinuxSubscriptionsDiscovery
parameters.description: Describes if the discovery of Linux subscriptions is enabled.

parameters.name: LinuxSubscriptionsDiscoverySettings
parameters.description: The settings defined for Linux subscriptions discovery. The settings include if Organizations integration has been enabled, and which Regions data will be aggregated from. Details if you have enabled resource discovery across your accounts in Organizations. The Regions in which to discover data for Linux subscriptions. (string) ---

nested_params.name: OrganizationIntegration
nested_params.description: Details if you have enabled resource discovery across your accounts in Organizations.

nested_params.name: SourceRegions
nested_params.description: The Regions in which to discover data for Linux subscriptions.

nested_items.name: HomeRegions
nested_items.description: The Region in which License Manager displays the aggregated data for Linux subscriptions.

nested_items.name: LinuxSubscriptionsDiscovery
nested_items.description: Lists if discovery has been enabled for Linux subscriptions.

nested_items.name: LinuxSubscriptionsDiscoverySettings
nested_items.description: The settings defined for Linux subscriptions discovery. The settings include if Organizations integration has been enabled, and which Regions data will be aggregated from.

nested_items.name: OrganizationIntegration
nested_items.description: Details if you have enabled resource discovery across your accounts in Organizations.

nested_items.name: SourceRegions
nested_items.description: The Regions in which to discover data for Linux subscriptions.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of Linux subscriptions settings being applied.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message which details the Linux subscriptions service settings current status.
